address.description: URL of the root of the target Nomad agent.

ca_file.description: A path to a PEM-encoded certificate authority used to verify the remote agent's certificate.

cert_file.description: A path to a PEM-encoded certificate provided to the remote agent; requires use of key_file.

key_file.description: A path to a PEM-encoded private key, required if cert_file is specified.

tls_server_name.description: Specifies an optional string used to set the SNI host when connecting to Vault via TLS.

create_time.description: The timestamp the token was created.

global.description: Whether the token should be replicated to all regions or not.

policies.description: The ACL policies to associate with the token, if it's a 'client' type.

secret_id.description: The value that grants access to Nomad.

type.description: The type of token to create, 'client' or 'management'.
